messages.content: I will restore common sense values and freedoms to the UK. The £45m a day saved by withdrawing from the EU will improve the NHS, education standards, care for the elderly and pension provision. I will seek to re-establish the armed forces covenant. Regional assemblies will be scrapped. I'll oppose wind farms, support farmers, fisherman, restoration of West Beach and promote cottage hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
Ensure politicians are accountable to the electorate
